mapper.select: select r.* from PHOIBE_ROLE r join PHOIBE_USER_ROLE ur on r.ROLE_ID = ur.ROLE_ID where ur.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert: insert into PHOIBE_ROLE (ROLE_ID, ROLE_TYPE, ROLE_NAME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{roleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{roleType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into PHOIBE_ROLE
ROLE_ID,
ROLE_TYPE,
ROLE_NAME,
CREATE_TIME,
UPDATE_TIME,
#{roleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{roleType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update PHOIBE_ROLE
ROLE_TYPE = #{roleType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ROLE_NAME = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
